name: Jasper AI
about: A marketing-focused writing assistant that helps generate ads, blogs, and social media content.
summary: Create high-quality marketing content in minutes.
details: Jasper helps marketers and content creators produce engaging, SEO-friendly copy for blogs, websites, and campaigns — powered by AI templates and tones.
howTo: Open Jasper and choose a content template (e.g., blog post).
Add keywords, tone, and a short product description.
Generate and edit the draft in Jasper’s editor.
Export or copy your finished content.
